backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Viral Growth OS backend, handling user subscriptions (free/pro/elite tiers), content generation requests, brand voice profiles, user profiles, and Stripe checkout/webhook integration with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (Internet Identity login/logout, first-login profile setup modal, and post-login dashboard redirect) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and recent changes of every component, page, hook, and style file.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide for publishing the Viral Growth OS to the Internet Computer mainnet, covering prerequisites (DFX CLI, cycles wallet, identity setup) and the build/deploy steps.
frontend/docs/STRIPE_SETUP.md: Step-by-step guide for creating Pro and Elite Stripe subscription products, configuring webhooks, updating backend price IDs, and testing the checkout flow with troubleshooting tips.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Viral Growth OS | PopTechSavvy' and mounting the React root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider, and uses AppShell to globally orchestrate the first-login ProfileSetupModal and navigation.
frontend/src/components/ContentOutput.ts: Displays generated content (hooks, scripts, captions) in cards with copy-to-clipboard functionality, meta badges, and upgrade prompts for locked features based on the user's feature set.
frontend/src/components/ContentScoreCard: Renders a card showing hook strength, retention potential, and monetization potential scores as color-coded progress bars with an average score and optional virality explanation.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Displays a promotional countdown timer with days, hours, minutes, and seconds until a fixed 7-day deadline, showing an expiry message when the offer ends.
An auto-advancing image carousel showcasing three product features (Viral Hook Generator, Platform-Optimized Scripts, Monetization Intelligence) with navigation controls and pause-on-hover behavior.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing page hero section with animated headline, subtext, and a CTA button that routes authenticated users to content generation or unauthenticated users to pricing.
frontend/src/components/LandingPageNav.t: A desktop navigation bar for the landing page that highlights the active section using scroll-spy and smoothly scrolls to sections on click.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component providing a sticky header with logo, responsive navigation links, admin links, and Internet Identity login/logout functionality.
A small alert component displaying a legal notice reminding users they are responsible for their generated content and compliance with laws and platform terms.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a new user's name and email on first visit, saving the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation and showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: A landing-page section that renders three hardcoded creator testimonial cards with star ratings, quotes, and author info, using scroll-animation hooks for staggered entrance effects.
frontend/src/components/UpgradePrompt.ts: A small UI component that displays a locked-feature message with the required subscription tier and a styled upgrade button linking to the pricing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarousel.ts: A hook that manages carousel state with auto-advance on a configurable interval, manual next/prev/goTo navigation, and pause/resume controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: A hook that counts down to a given target `Date`, updating state every second and returning days, hours, minutes, seconds, and an `isExpired` flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: A React Query hook that fetches the authenticated caller's user profile from the backend actor, merging actor-loading state into the returned `isLoading` flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage ICP Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/clear functions and status flags backed by `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks and mutations for all backend interactions, including user profile, subscription, Stripe checkout, tier/feature checks, content generation, and brand voice operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRippleEffect.ts: A hook that attaches a CSS ripple animation to a button element on click, respecting the user's `prefers-reduced-motion` setting.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Provides two React hooks using IntersectionObserver: `useScrollAnimation` adds an 'in-view' class to a single element when it enters the viewport, and `useScrollAnimationGroup` does the same for multiple child elements matching a CSS selector. Both respect the `prefers-reduced-motion` media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollSpy.ts: React hook that observes a list of section IDs with IntersectionObserver and returns the ID of the currently visible section, enabling active-state highlighting in navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes using OKLCH values, and declares keyframe animations (fade-in, slide-up, ripple, etc.) used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `ReactQueryProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrappers around the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/ContentGenerator.tsx: Page component that provides a form for authenticated users to generate viral content (hooks, scripts, captions) by selecting niche, platform, tone, audience, and goal, then calling backend mutation hooks and displaying results via `ContentOutput`.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page for authenticated users showing their subscription tier, enabled feature set, and content request history, with links to upgrade or start generating content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page composed of a hero section, stats bar, feature grid, how-it-works steps, testimonials, and CTA sections, with scroll animations and ripple effects applied throughout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Static page displayed after a cancelled or failed payment, informing the user they were not charged and offering buttons to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Page shown after a successful payment that invalidates subscription-related queries to refresh state and provides navigation links to the dashboard and content generator.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders a three-tier pricing page (Free, Pro, Elite) with plan details, feature lists, and Stripe checkout integration. Handles unauthenticated users by prompting login before redirecting to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only page for configuring Stripe integration by entering a secret key and allowed countries. Shows current configuration status and webhook URL for IC mainnet deployments.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionManagemen: Displays the authenticated user's current subscription tier, its features, and billing status, with an option to upgrade via a link to the pricing page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with CSS-variable-based color tokens, vibrant palette colors, custom fonts, glow box shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state including completed features (Internet Identity login, profile setup modal, dashboard redirect) and pending tasks (authenticated backend actor initialization) for the content creator SaaS app.
